content: the court of appeals in venice has issued a final resolution in a legal case one party has been ordered to pay a specific amount of money to another party along with legal interest the court has also dissolved a community between the parties and ordered the distribution of a certain amount of money among them additionally one party has been obligated to pay a certain amount of money to their mother along with legal interest the case began with a summons and counterclaim followed by several hearings and a ruling by the trial judge one party appealed the ruling but the court of appeals dismissed or upheld the grounds for appeal the court also examined the claims made by the parties and made decisions accordingly the judgment addressed the issue of collation of money received from parents and ordered the parties to pay their respective shares the court also addressed the issue of costs partially offsetting them between the parties the court of appeals in venice has made a final decision ordering one party to pay a specific amount of money to another party dissolving a community and declaring a bank branch to pay a specific amount of money to a person the rest of the original judgment has been confirmed and the costs of the case will be compensated

metadata.CASE_ID: Corte appello Venezia sez. II, 28/06/2017, n.1328
